properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee.

Presented in exceptional decorative order, here is a six-bedroom, seven-bathroom stately home of unparalleled elegance. The custom-designed kitchen blends classic design with modern convenience, featuring premium integrated appliances and opening seamlessly into a grand dining area with oak floors and a view of the manicured grounds. The master suite includes a marble ensuite with spa bath, walk-in wardrobes, and a private sitting area. The manor boasts additional luxurious bedrooms, a private study, and a hidden passage leading to a subterranean complex with a cinema, gym, and wine cellar. Combining timeless grandeur with modern sophistication, this is a masterpiece of architectural refinement.
properties.location: 14 Meadow Lane, Bromley BR2 9QT, United Kingdom

properties.description: Situated in the heart of London, 221B Baker Street is a charming, historic property steeped in Victorian elegance. This two-bedroom residence features a cozy yet refined sitting room with a period fireplace, high ceilings, and large sash windows that invite natural light. The property boasts a traditional kitchen with classic finishes and a spacious master suite. Perfectly blending character and convenience, this iconic address offers proximity to London’s cultural landmarks and is a haven of timeless charm.
properties.location: 221B Baker Street, London, NW1 6XE, United Kingdom

properties.description: Situated in a peaceful corner of Surrey, 22 Willow Grove, GU2 8AB, is a delightful four-bedroom family home exuding modern comfort and elegance. Boasting a spacious living room with a cozy fireplace, a sleek, contemporary kitchen opening into a bright dining space, and a master bedroom with a private en-suite, this property is perfectly tailored for family life. Three additional bedrooms offer ample versatility, while the landscaped garden provides a serene outdoor retreat. Located close to excellent schools and local amenities, this home is an idyllic blend of practicality and charm.

Nestled in the heart of Cambridge, this charming one-bedroom apartment in Kingfisher Apartments offers a cozy and contemporary living space, ideal for professionals or couples. The apartment features an open-plan living and dining area filled with natural light, a modern kitchen with sleek fittings, and a comfortable bedroom with ample storage. Situated on the tranquil Meadow Lane, it provides easy access to local shops, parks, and transport links, combining convenience with the charm of Cambridge living.
properties.location: Flat 7, Kingfisher Apartments, 12 Meadow Lane, Cambridge

properties.description: This delightful two-bedroom, two-bathroom house at 16 Rosewood Crescent offers the perfect blend of suburban charm and modern convenience. Nestled in the peaceful Willowbrook Estate, the property features a spacious living area, a contemporary kitchen, and two well-sized bedrooms with ample natural light. The highlight is the private lawn, ideal for outdoor relaxation or entertaining, complemented by the quiet, family-friendly surroundings. With excellent transport links and local amenities nearby, this home is perfect for professionals, couples, or small families seeking a tranquil lifestyle close to Cambridge.
properties.location: 16 Rosewood Crescent, Willowbrook Estate, Cambridge, CB3 7LN, United Kingdom

properties.description: Situated on the charming Rue des Lilas, this cozy studio apartment offers a blend of modern comfort and quintessential Parisian charm. With its compact yet well-designed layout, the apartment features an open-plan living space, a sleek kitchenette, and large windows that frame a breathtaking view of the Eiffel Tower. Perfect for singles or couples, this tranquil retreat is nestled in the vibrant 19th arrondissement, with cafés, parks, and metro access just steps away, making it an ideal spot to experience the magic of Paris.
properties.location: Apartment 5C, 15 Rue des Lilas, 75019 Paris, France
